doc.description:
Ublox GPS autoconfiguration.
Automatically configure any Ublox GPS for paparazzi.
- configures all the messages, and the rates - automatic baudrate detection
Warning: you still need to tell the driver, which paparazzi port you use.

define.name: GPS_UBX_NAV5_DYNAMICS
define.description: Dynamic model used by ublox GPS filter. Default:NAV5_DYN_AIRBORNE_2G

define.name: USE_GPS_UBX_RXM_RAW
define.description: Activate raw measurments (only available on U-Blox T versions)
